jeffrey epstein.description: American financier and convicted sex offender
jeffrey epstein.profile: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was an American financier and convicted sex offender. He began his professional life as a teacher but then switched to the banking and finance sector in various roles.

darren indyke.profile: Attorney who served as legal counsel and advisor. Known for handling complex legal matters and estate planning.

deepak chopra.description: Indian-American author and alternative medicine advocate
deepak chopra.profile: Deepak Chopra is an Indian-American author and alternative medicine advocate. A prominent figure in the New Age movement, his books and videos have made him one of the best-known and wealthiest figures in alternative medicine.

joi ito.description: Japanese-American venture capitalist and former MIT Media Lab director
joi ito.profile: Joichi Ito is a Japanese-American venture capitalist, entrepreneur, and academic. He was the director of the MIT Media Lab from 2011 to 2019.

kathy ruemmler.description: American lawyer and former White House Counsel
kathy ruemmler.profile: Kathryn Ruemmler is an American lawyer who served as White House Counsel under President Barack Obama from 2011 to 2014.

ken starr.description: American lawyer and former independent counsel
ken starr.profile: Kenneth Winston Starr was an American lawyer and judge who as independent counsel authored the Starr Report, which led to the impeachment of Bill Clinton.

landon thomas jr.profile: Financial journalist and reporter covering markets, banking, and economic affairs.

lawrence krauss.profile: Lawrence Maxwell Krauss is an American theoretical physicist and cosmologist who previously taught at Arizona State University, Yale University, and Case Western Reserve University.

lawrence summers.description: American economist and former Treasury Secretary
lawrence summers.profile: Lawrence Henry Summers is an American economist who served as the 71st United States Secretary of the Treasury from 1999 to 2001 and as director of the National Economic Council from 2009 to 2010.

lesley groff.profile: Former executive assistant and administrator involved in various business operations.

lisa new.profile: Professional contact and associate in various business matters.

michael wolff.profile: Michael Wolff is an American author, essayist, journalist, and a regular columnist for USA Today, The Hollywood Reporter, and the British edition of GQ.

noam chomsky.description: American linguist, philosopher, and political activist
noam chomsky.profile: Avram Noam Chomsky is an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historical essayist, social critic, and political activist.

robert kuhn.description: American investment banker and television host
robert kuhn.profile: Robert Lawrence Kuhn is an American investment banker, author, and television host. He has a doctorate in neuroscience and is known for his work in China-US relations.

steve bannon.description: American media executive and political strategist
steve bannon.profile: Stephen Kevin Bannon is an American media executive, political strategist, and former investment banker who served as the White House's chief strategist in the administration of U.S. president Donald Trump.

sultan bin sulayem.profile: Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem is an Emirati businessman who is the group chairman and CEO of DP World and chairman of Virgin Hyperloop One.

weingarten, reid.profile: Reid Weingarten is a prominent American defense attorney known for representing high-profile clients in white-collar criminal cases.

g maxwell.description: British socialite and convicted sex trafficker
g maxwell.profile: Ghislaine Noelle Marion Maxwell is a British former socialite and convicted sex offender. She was found guilty in 2021 of child sex trafficking and other offences.
